medi:segment.description: To specify the name/address and their related function, either by C082 only and/or unstructured by C058 or structured by C080 thru 3207.
medi:segment.name: NAME AND ADDRESS

medi:field.name: Party function code qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.

medi:field.name: PARTY IDENTIFICATION DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a transaction party by code.

medi:component.name: Party identifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the identity of a party.

medi:component.name: Code list identification code
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency code
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.name: NAME AND ADDRESS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Unstructured name and address: one to five lines.

medi:component.name: Name and address description
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:component.name: Name and address description
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:component.name: Name and address description
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:component.name: Name and address description
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:component.name: Name and address description
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:field.name: PARTY NAME
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a transaction party by name, one to five lines. Party name may be formatted.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party.

medi:component.name: Party name format code
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the representation of a party name.

medi:field.name: STREET
medi:field.medi:documentation: Street address and/or PO Box number in a structured address: one to four lines.

medi:component.name: Street and number or post office box identifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.

medi:component.name: Street and number or post office box identifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.

medi:component.name: Street and number or post office box identifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.

medi:component.name: Street and number or post office box identifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office box number.

medi:field.name: COUNTRY SUBDIVISION DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify a country subdivision, such as state, canton, county, prefecture.

medi:component.name: Country subdivision identifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a country subdivision, such as state, canton, county, prefecture.

medi:component.name: Code list identification code
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying a user or association maintained code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency code
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Country subdivision name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a country subdivision, such as state, canton, county, prefecture.

medi:field.name: Postal identification code
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the postal zone or address.

medi:field.name: Country identifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of the country or other geographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1 and UN/ECE Recommendation 3.
